code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{persistStore,persistReducer,FLUSH,REHYDRATE,PAUSE,PERSIST,PURGE,REGISTER}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import orebiReducer from"./orebiSlice";var persistConfig={key:"root",version:1,storage:storage};var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,orebiReducer);export var store=configureStore({reducer:{orebiReducer:persistedReducer},middleware:function middleware(getDefaultMiddleware){return getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:{ignoredActions:[FLUSH,REHYDRATE,PAUSE,PERSIST,PURGE,REGISTER]}});}});export var persistor=persistStore(store);
